trans-unit.source: Displays a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.
trans-unit.target: 显示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>中每个项的左边显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此控件显示的用户可以通过使用键盘或滚动条控件右侧导航的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过一个或多个项放置一个复选标记，并已选中的项可进行定位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时将对象添加到列表，分配的对象引用与数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该列表显示每个对象的默认字符串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual items to the list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将各个项添加到该列表与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedListBox object supports three states through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> enumeration: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: CheckedListBox 对象支持通过三种状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>枚举︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: You must set the state of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> in the code because the user interface for a CheckedListBox does not provide a mechanism to do so.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置的状态的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>代码中由于用户界面的各个 CheckedListBox 不提供一种机制来执行此操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> is `true`, the CheckedListBox will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>是`true`，CheckedListBox 将识别并展开制表符中项的文本创建列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 这些选项卡停止预设了并不能更改。

trans-unit.source: To use custom tab stops, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> to `false`, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> to `true`, and add the custom values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自定义选项卡停止，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>到`false`，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A>到`true`，并添加到自定义值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>将忽略属性，并将其替换为标准的制表位偏移量。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedListBox class supports the following three indexed collections: |Collection|Encapsulating Class| |----------------|-------------------------| |All items contained in the CheckedListBox control.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>| |Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the CheckedListBox control.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>| |Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection.
trans-unit.target: CheckedListBox 类支持以下三个索引的集合: |集合 |封装类 | |----------------|-------------------------| |CheckedListBox 控件中包含的所有项。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>| |选中的项 （处于不确定状态包括多个项），即 CheckedListBox 控件中包含的项的子集。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>| |选中的索引，是项集合中的索引子集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>| The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the CheckedListBox class supports.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引指定项处于选中或不确定状态。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>| 以下三个表是 CheckedListBox 类支持的三个索引集合的示例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control).
trans-unit.target: 第一个表提供的控件 （包含在控件中的所有项） 中的项的索引集合的示例。

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item|Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |0|Object 1|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |1|Object 2|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |2|Object 3|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |3|Object 4|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| |4|Object 5|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |项 |检查状态 | |-----------|----------|-----------------| | 0 |对象 1 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 1 |对象 2 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 2 |对象 3 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 3 |对象 4 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| | 4 |对象 5 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>| 第二个表提供了已选中项的索引集合的一个示例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item| |-----------|----------| |0|Object 2| |1|Object 4| |2|Object 5| The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items.
trans-unit.target: |索引 |项 | |-----------|----------| | 0 |对象 2 | | 1 |对象 4 | | 2 |对象 5 | 第三个表提供了选中项的索引的索引集合的示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> and the `ResizeRedraw` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>和`ResizeRedraw`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>指定控件在调整大小时重绘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked indexes in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在此检查索引的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 选中的索引的集合是中的所有项的集合中的索引子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> collection for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked items in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 选中此项的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only those items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: 集合是中的对象的子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>的项集合，表示只有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The indexes in this collection are in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的索引都按升序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> collection for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选定项时是否应切换复选框。

trans-unit.source: CheckOnClick indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: CheckOnClick 指示每当选择项是否应切换复选框。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为是更改在第一次单击，选择，然后再次单击以应用复选标记的用户。

trans-unit.source: In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，但是，你可能更喜欢具有项检查，只要单击它。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果立即; 应用复选标记否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 单击事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events, which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （如按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件，将传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>到事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以调整可以传递期间双击鼠标按钮点击之间的时间量。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: 每次用户双击控件时，将引发单击事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event-handling methods for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有为单击事件处理方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件的窗体中，双击窗体，这两个事件处理方法调用时引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户双击控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，可能引发事件两次单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建项集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>表示新的项集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄时，请获取需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>属性不应重写，用于调整派生控件的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>应该通过如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>控件中的相应属性将设置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置样式不是由 Windows 窗体命名空间时才应扩展。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和`CREATESTRUCT`Windows 平台 SDK 参考中的结构文档位于 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required parameters.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> ，其中包含所需的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的数据源。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: 表示数据源的对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies a property of the objects contained in the list box whose contents you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定的对象属性包含在列表框中你想要显示其的内容。

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> displays the default string for the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>显示其包含的项的默认字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the DisplayMember property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>可以显示不同类型的对象，并且你可能想要通过指定 DisplayMember 属性来更改显示的字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the DisplayMember property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A> method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性不存在，或 DisplayMember 属性的值为空字符串 ("")，该对象的结果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>方法将改为显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the new value of the DisplayMember cannot be set, the previous value is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能设置 DisplayMember 的新值，保留以前的值。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定列表框中包含的对象的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的一个所有者绘制的可视方位<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>更改。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可由所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>绘制项所需的任务

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised before the item is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果你拥有一个可变大小的项 (即，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>绘制项之前，将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要绘制在 DrawItem 事件的事件处理程序中的项的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the mode for drawing elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值的模式的绘制元素<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Always a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is checked.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否检查指定的项。

trans-unit.source: GetItemChecked returns `true` if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate` for the item.
trans-unit.target: GetItemChecked 返回`true`如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: To determine the specific state the item is in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定项处于特定状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果选中项;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index 指定小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or- The index specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: -或- index 指定为大于或等于列表中的项的计数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the check state of the current item.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前项的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: The GetItemCheckState method provides the ability to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value of an item, given the index.
trans-unit.target: GetItemCheckState 方法能够获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>项，为索引提供了值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你永远不会设置一个项的复选状态`Indeterminate`，然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to get the checked value of.
trans-unit.target: 要获取已选中的值的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index 指定小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or- The index specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: -或- index 指定为大于或等于列表中的项的计数。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 当某个项的选中的状态更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The check state is not updated until after the ItemCheck event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 直到事件发生后，直到会被更新的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 获取项区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item.
trans-unit.target: 此测量值基于字体高度加上一个小边距来提供项周围的空白区域。

trans-unit.source: The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial.
trans-unit.target: 当字体更改为 9.75 点 Arial"g"、"y"等字符的扩展部分不正确显示。

trans-unit.source: To correct this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and override ItemHeight to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要纠正此问题，派生类从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>并重写 ItemHeight 返回`base.ItemHeight+2`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，项区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在此获取的项的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Items property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 项目属性使您能够获取对当前存储中的项列表的引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过此引用，可以将项添加、 删除项，并获取集合中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用项集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>类参考主题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> collection representing the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>表示中的项集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is created and the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: 当一个所有者绘制时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>创建并且列表项的大小已确定。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size of an item before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序以指定的项的大小，绘制之前此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>项是 255 像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法选择或清除复选框单击的项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>属性设置为`true`，复选框切换从单击项的选中或清除状态第一个时间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected.
trans-unit.target: 否则，仅当已选定了项，则会切换复选框。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If the spacebar is pressed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the OnKeyPress method switches the check state of the item currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果按空格键和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>，当前选定项的复选状态的 OnKeyPress 方法开关。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置填充内<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A> that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 默认值时控件接收<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>规范的合理即将 Windows 用户界面指南。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Padding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: 一些调整可能仍有必要为特定应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件的内部间距特征。

trans-unit.source: Parses all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> items again and gets new text strings for the items.
trans-unit.target: 分析所有<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>再次项，并获取项的新文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定选择模式。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: SelectionMode 属性确定是否可以选择列表框中的一项或可以选择任何项。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> objects, multiple selection is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>不支持多个选择的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can set the mode to one item or no items.
trans-unit.target: 可以将模式设置为一项或没有任何项。

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Either the <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value that is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将分配一个值，不是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>值<xref uid="langword_csharp_One" name="One" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MultiExtended" name="MultiExtended" href=""></xref> value of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> to the control.
trans-unit.target: 尝试分配<xref uid="langword_csharp_MultiExtended" name="MultiExtended" href=""></xref>值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref>到控件。

trans-unit.source: Sets <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> for the item at the specified index to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>到指定索引处的项的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Checked" name="Checked" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 值时`true`传递时，此方法设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>值赋给`Checked`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Unchecked`.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>到`Unchecked`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to set the check state for.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的复选状态的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the item as checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要设置的项为选中状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: -或者-索引大于列表中项的计数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the check state of the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定索引处的项的复选状态。

trans-unit.source: The SetItemCheckState method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: SetItemCheckState 方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: Items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is set to `Indeterminate` appear with a check mark in the check box, but the box is grayed to indicate the indeterminate status of the checked item.
trans-unit.target: 项其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>设置为`Indeterminate`显示带有复选标记中该复选框，但框为灰显，指示选中的项不确定状态。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to set the state for.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的状态的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The index specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index 指定小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or- The index is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: -或- index 大于或等于列表中的项的计数。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: value 不是一个值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check boxes have a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否具有对应的复选框<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref>的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Flat" name="Flat" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check box has a flat appearance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果复选框具有平面的外观;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否使用<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref>类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的自定义文本呈现</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/add/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/add/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类用于执行所有文本呈现。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法的参数替换`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the property of the data source from which to draw the value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，指定要从中取值的数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the contents of the ValueMember property in cases where you bind data.
trans-unit.target: 在将数据绑定的情况下指定的 ValueMember 属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can clear the ValueMember property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将属性设置为一个空字符串清除的 ValueMember 属性 ("") 或`null`。

trans-unit.source: Setting a new ValueMember property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的 ValueMember 属性会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.SelectedValueChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMemberChanged>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the property of the data source from which to draw the value.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定要从中取值的数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified property cannot be found on the object specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象上找不到指定的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ValueMember*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Processes the command message the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control receives from the top-level window.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令消息<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>控件接收到从顶级窗口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> the top-level window sent to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>发送到的顶级窗口<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>到进程。
